components.description: Tracks issues related to the HCatalog

components.description: Issues related to Hive Query Languages type system

fields.description:
Falcon using hcat api to verify the target table schema and getting the error:

java.lang.RuntimeException: cannot find field givenName(lowercase form: givenname) in [givenName, surname, middleName, gender, age, isGivenNameLowerCase, isGivenNameUpperCase, isPrimary, isSurnameLowerCase, isSurnameUpperCase]

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: HCAT api call is case sensitive on fields in struct column
